functions.name: adjustBlinds
functions.description: Adjusts the height of blinds based on the provided percentage open.

functions.name: fuzzyLight
functions.description: Calculates fuzzy light levels based on cloud cover percentage.

functions.name: fuzzyTemperature
functions.description: Calculates fuzzy temperature levels based on temperature value.

functions.name: computeBlindsPosition
functions.description: Computes the blinds position based on ambient light and temperature.
